question.question: My dear fellow, what race dost thou believe Hart, the Horn-crowned, belongs to within the tales of Middle-earth?
question.text: My dear fellow, what race dost thou believe Hart, the Horn-crowned, belongs to within the tales of Middle-earth?

feedback.message: Excellent! Your wisdom rivals that of the White Council itself!
next_steps: Continue your journey through the deeper mysteries of Middle-earth.
Share your wisdom with others who seek to understand these ancient tales.
